00021 LibraryTableView::LibraryTableView(LibraryHandler* handler, 
00022                                                                    LibrarySearchFilter* filter, 
00023                                                                    QWidget *parent):
00024 QTableView(parent),
00025 filter_(filter),
00026 handler_(handler),
00027 openDesignAction_(NULL),
00028 openCompAction_(NULL),
00029 createNewComponentAction_(NULL),
00030 createNewDesignAction_(NULL),
00031 deleteAction_(NULL),
00032 exportAction_(NULL),
00033 hideAction_(NULL),
00034 showAction_(NULL),
00035 refreshAction_(NULL),
00036 openBusDefAction_(NULL),
00037 createBusDefAction_(NULL) {
00038 
00039         // the view can be sorted
00040         setSortingEnabled(true);
00041 
00042         // cells are resized to match contents and last column is stretched take the
00043         // available space in the widget
00044         horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(
00045                         QHeaderView::ResizeToContents);
00046         horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00047 
00048         horizontalHeader()->setMinimumSectionSize(20);
00049         horizontalHeader()->setSortIndicatorShown(false);
00050         horizontalHeader()->setDefaultSectionSize(20);
00051 
00052         setColumnWidth(4, 20);
00053         setAlternatingRowColors(true);
00054 
00055         // vertical headers are not visible
00056         verticalHeader()->hide();
00057 
00058         // words are wrapped in the cells to minimize space usage
00059         setWordWrap(true);
00060 
00061         // user can only select one item at the time and the whole row is selected
00062         setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00063         setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectRows);
00064 
00065         // set up the context menu actions
00066         setupActions();
00067 }

00069 LibraryTableView::~LibraryTableView() {
00070 }

00072 void LibraryTableView::contextMenuEvent(QContextMenuEvent* event) {
00073 
00074         Q_ASSERT_X(event, "LibraryTableView::contextMenuEvent",
00075                         "Invalid event pointer given as parameter");
00076 
00077         // accept the event so it is not passed forwards
00078         event->accept();
00079 
00080         QModelIndex current = currentIndex();
00081 
00082         // if nothing was chosen
00083         if (!current.isValid()) {
00084                 return;
00085         }
00086 
00087         // get original model index so internalPointer can be used
00088         QModelIndex sourceIndex = filter_->mapToSource(current);
00089 
00090         VLNV* vlnv = static_cast<VLNV*>(sourceIndex.internalPointer());
00091 
00092         Q_ASSERT_X(vlnv, "LibraryTableView::contextMenuEvent",
00093                 "Null item pointer");
00094 
00095         // create a menu to show contextMenu actions
00096         QMenu menu(this);
00097 
00098         bool hierarchical = false;
00099 
00100         // parse the model
00101         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(*vlnv);
00102         if (!libComp) {
00103                 emit errorMessage(tr("Item not found in library"));
00104                 return;
00105         }
00106 
00107         // if component
00108         if (libComp->getVlnv()->getType() == VLNV::COMPONENT) {
00109                 QSharedPointer<Component> component = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00110 
00111                 if (component->isHierarchical()) {
00112                         menu.addAction(openDesignAction_);
00113                         hierarchical = true;
00114                 }
00115 
00116                 menu.addAction(openCompAction_);
00117 
00118         }
00119         else if (libComp->getVlnv()->getType() == VLNV::BUSDEFINITION) {
00120 
00121                 menu.addAction(openBusDefAction_);
00122         }
00123 
00124         // if item is a component
00125         if (vlnv->getType() == VLNV::COMPONENT) {
00126                 menu.addAction(createNewComponentAction_);
00127 
00128                 // if component was not hierarchical then design can be created for it.
00129                 if (!hierarchical)
00130                         menu.addAction(createNewDesignAction_);
00131         }
00132         // if item is for bus definitions
00133         else if (vlnv->getType() == VLNV::BUSDEFINITION) {
00134                 menu.addAction(createBusDefAction_);
00135         }
00136 
00137         menu.addAction(deleteAction_);
00138         menu.addAction(exportAction_);
00139 
00140         // if item is visible
00141         if (!vlnv->isHidden())
00142                 menu.addAction(hideAction_);
00143         
00144         // if item is hidden
00145         else 
00146                 menu.addAction(showAction_);
00147 
00148         menu.addAction(refreshAction_);
00149 
00150         menu.exec(event->globalPos());
00151 }
00152 
00153 void LibraryTableView::setupActions() {
00154 
00155         openDesignAction_ = new QAction(tr("Open Design"), this);
00156         openDesignAction_->setStatusTip(tr("Open a hierarchical design"));
00157         openDesignAction_->setToolTip(tr("Open a hierarchical design"));
00158         connect(openDesignAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00159                 this, SLOT(onOpenDesign()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00160 
00161         openCompAction_ = new QAction(tr("Open Component"), this);
00162         openCompAction_->setStatusTip(tr("Open component editor"));
00163         openCompAction_->setToolTip(tr("Open component editor"));
00164         connect(openCompAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00165                 this, SLOT(onOpenComponent()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00166 
00167         createNewComponentAction_ = new QAction(tr("Create New Component Here"), this);
00168         createNewComponentAction_->setStatusTip(tr("Create new component"));
00169         createNewComponentAction_->setToolTip(tr("Create new component"));
00170         connect(createNewComponentAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00171                 this, SLOT(onCreateComponent()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00172 
00173         createNewDesignAction_ = new QAction(tr("Create New Design Here"), this);
00174         createNewDesignAction_->setStatusTip(tr("Create new design"));
00175         createNewDesignAction_->setToolTip(tr("Create new design"));
00176         connect(createNewDesignAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00177                 this, SLOT(onCreateDesign()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00178 
00179         deleteAction_ = new QAction(tr("Delete Item"), this);
00180         deleteAction_->setStatusTip(tr("Delete item from the library"));
00181         deleteAction_->setToolTip(tr("Delete the item from the library"));
00182         connect(deleteAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00183                 this, SLOT(onDeleteAction()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00184 
00185         exportAction_ = new QAction(tr("Export"), this);
00186         exportAction_->setStatusTip(tr("Export item and it's sub-items to another location"));
00187         exportAction_->setToolTip(tr("Export item and it's sub-items to another location"));
00188         connect(exportAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00189                 this, SLOT(onExportAction()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00190 
00191         hideAction_ = new QAction(tr("Hide Item"), this);
00192         hideAction_->setStatusTip(tr("Set item as hidden"));
00193         hideAction_->setToolTip(tr("Set item as hidden"));
00194         connect(hideAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00195                 this, SLOT(onHideAction()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00196 
00197         showAction_ = new QAction(tr("Show Item"), this);
00198         showAction_->setStatusTip(tr("Set item as unhidden"));
00199         showAction_->setToolTip(tr("Set item as unhidden"));
00200         connect(showAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00201                 this, SLOT(onShowAction()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00202 
00203         refreshAction_ = new QAction(tr("Check Library Integrity"), this);
00204         refreshAction_->setStatusTip(tr("Refresh the library and check it's integrity"));
00205         refreshAction_->setToolTip(tr("Refresh the library and check it's integrity"));
00206         connect(refreshAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00207                 this, SIGNAL(refreshLibrary()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00208 
00209         openBusDefAction_ = new QAction(tr("Open"), this);
00210         openBusDefAction_->setStatusTip(tr("Open"));
00211         openBusDefAction_->setToolTip(tr("Open"));
00212         connect(openBusDefAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00213                 this, SLOT(onOpenBusDef()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00214 
00215         createBusDefAction_ = new QAction(tr("Create New"), this);
00216         createBusDefAction_->setStatusTip(tr("Create new"));
00217         createBusDefAction_->setToolTip(tr("Create new"));
00218         connect(createBusDefAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00219                 this, SLOT(onCreateBusDef()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00220 }
00221 
00222 void LibraryTableView::onExportAction() {
00223         emit exportItem(filter_->mapToSource(currentIndex()));
00224 }
00225 
00226 void LibraryTableView::onDeleteAction() {
00227 
00228         // ask for confirmation for delete
00229         QMessageBox::StandardButton button = QMessageBox::question(this, 
00230                 tr("Delete the selected item?"), 
00231                 tr("Are you sure you want to delete the selected item?"),
00232                 QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::Cancel, QMessageBox::Cancel);
00233 
00234         // if user clicked "yes" to delete
00235         if (button == QMessageBox::Yes)
00236                 emit deleteItem(filter_->mapToSource(currentIndex()));
00237 }
